content: hey. i am not sure if other users are experiencing this issue, but I wanted to give you a description so you can help me fix it. otherwise I want a replacement. so basically, my monitor display flashes for about thirty seconds, probably once a day, sometimes more often. it is a DELL 34 CURVED USB-C MONITOR S3423DWC. i replaced the HDMI cable, got a power bar, and have checked to see if there is a software update and the issue persists. waht do you recommend for next steps?
